friends.wantsToAdd: Wants to add you as a friend

desc.capricorn: Stubborn as a ram, but pretends to be a goat. Trains until the gym closes, then does 10 more sets at home.
desc.aquarius: The most unpredictable sign. Comes to the gym to do legs, leaves having trained only biceps. And somehow it works!
desc.pisces: Floats between machines like water. Never finishes a program, but has perfect form. Spiritual gains only.
desc.aries: First in line when gym opens, argues about squat depth. Personal record is more important than personal relationships.
desc.taurus: Slow but unstoppable. Been on the same program for 5 years. If it works, why change? Owns the squat rack.
desc.gemini: Has two workout personalities: 'Beast Mode' and 'Maybe Tomorrow'. Gives unsolicited advice, half of it actually good.
desc.cancer: Brings homemade protein bars for everyone. Cries during motivational videos. Spots strangers like they're family.
desc.leo: Mirror is the favorite machine. Grunts louder than necessary. Instagram post before the workout even starts.
desc.virgo: Spreadsheet for every rep. Wipes machines before AND after. Judges your form silently but intensely.
desc.libra: Can't decide between cardio and weights, does neither properly. Looks good doing nothing. Natural peacekeeper of the gym.
desc.scorpio: Trains in the corner, watching everyone. Knows your max without asking. Intense eye contact during heavy lifts.
desc.sagittarius: Tries every new workout trend. Injured from something experimental. Still convinced that horse yoga is the future.

errors.unsupportedImageFormat: Unsupported format. Use JPG, PNG or WebP.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum 20 MB.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Reppy ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our workout tracking application.

dataCollected.title: Information We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of information:

items.name: Display name and username (optional, for personalization)
items.workouts: Workout data including exercises, sets, reps, weights, and photos you choose to upload
items.settings: App preferences such as language, theme, and unit system

items.provide: Provide and maintain the workout tracking service

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: Your data is stored securely using Supabase, a trusted cloud database provider. We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption in transit and at rest. Your workout data is also cached locally on your device for offline access.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. Your workout data is only shared when you explicitly create a public share link or add friends who can view your workouts.

items.access: Access all your personal data stored in the application
items.export: Export your workout data in JSON, CSV, or Excel format
items.delete: Delete your account and all associated data permanently

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.content: We use local storage to save your preferences (language, theme, accent color) and authentication tokens. We do not use third-party tracking cookies.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Reppy, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the application.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: Reppy is a workout tracking application that allows you to log exercises, track progress, share workouts with friends, and export your fitness data. The service is provided "as is" and may be updated or modified at any time.

account.title: User Account
account.intro: To use Reppy, you must create an account. You are responsible for:

items.accurate: Providing accurate and complete registration information
items.secure: Maintaining the security of your account credentials
items.responsible: All activities that occur under your account

items.illegal: Use the service for any illegal purpose
items.harm: Upload harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
items.interfere: Attempt to interfere with or disrupt the service
items.impersonate: Impersonate other users or provide false information

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of the content you create (workout data, photos, comments). By using our service, you grant us a license to store and display your content as necessary to provide the service. You are responsible for ensuring your content does not violate any laws or third-party rights.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The Reppy application, including its design, features, and code, is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute any part of the application without our permission.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Reppy is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or meet your specific requirements. Workout tracking is for informational purposes only and should not replace professional fitness or medical advice.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service, including but not limited to loss of data or physical injury from exercise.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms or for any other reason at our discretion. You may delete your account at any time through the application settings.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us at

reminder.title: You're doing great!
reminder.message: You've completed {{count}} workouts! Create an account to keep your progress safe.

settings.title: Create an Account

leaderboard.description: Create an account to see how you rank against other athletes and compete for the top spots!

migration.title: Guest Workouts Found
migration.description: You have {{count}} workout(s) saved as a guest. Would you like to add them to your account?
migration.hint: If you discard, the guest workouts will be deleted and cannot be recovered.

logs.title: Error Logs
logs.clearAllDescription: {{count}} records will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

cleanup.unusedExercisesDesc: User-created exercises that were never used or not used for 30+ days
cleanup.confirmEmptyWorkouts: Delete {{count}} empty workouts? This cannot be undone.
cleanup.confirmOrphanedExercises: Delete {{count}} orphaned records? This cannot be undone.
cleanup.confirmUnusedExercises: Delete {{count}} unused exercises? This cannot be undone.

users.confirmRemoveAdminDesc: {{name}} will lose access to the admin panel.
users.confirmDeleteUserDesc: User {{name}} and all their data (workouts, sets, friends) will be permanently deleted.
